snippet.title: Track your inventory more efficiently with My Inventory
snippet.description: Learn how to use My Inventory, an inexpensive Android app that allows you to track inventory with your smartphone.

snippet.title: Track time easily with Timesheet Time Tracker
snippet.description: Find out how to install, configure, and use Timesheet Time Tracker on your Android tablet.

snippet.title: Five budget apps to help you keep tabs on your spending
snippet.description: Take advantage of budget apps so your business expenses can be better managed and not be a nightmare at the end of the year.

snippet.title: Alternatives to using Office COM objects within web apps
snippet.description: Don't use Office COM objects within web applications. Developer Justin James explains why it's a bad idea and suggests three better alternatives.

snippet.title: Web design basics: How to create snazzy tables and when to use them
snippet.description: Ryan Boudreaux demonstrates the basics of importing and exporting tabular data in Dreamweaver and then sorting and formatting the data to create attractive tables for web pages.
